sentences.english: After eating breakfast, you will visit the Western Xia Tombs on the way back to Yinchuan.
sentences.chinese: 早餐後，回銀川路上，參觀西夏陵墓。

sentences.english: Does Panthea or Pergamus now sit by the tomb of Verus?
sentences.chinese: 潘瑟或帕加穆斯現在還坐在維勒斯的陵墓之側嗎？

sentences.english: Yes, this is the tomb of West Han Dynasty's Guangling State Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，這裏是西漢廣陵國王的陵墓。

sentences.english: Shah Jehan wanted his wife's tomb to be perfect.
sentences.chinese: 沙哲汗要把他愛妃的陵墓修得盡善盡美。

sentences.english: The unique characteristics of Western Xia mausoleums are clearly visible on the spiritual terraces.
sentences.chinese: 西夏陵墓的唯一特徵是可以明顯地看出其等級。

sentences.english: Montserrat actually sees the discovery of the tomb as beneficial to King Tut's soul.
sentences.chinese: 蒙瑟雷特認爲，陵墓的發現其實對塔特王的靈魂有益。

sentences.english: The shrine is believed by many to be the tomb of the Prophet Muhammad's son-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都相信這座清真寺是先知穆罕默德女婿的陵墓。

sentences.english: This elaborate tomb was built for King Mausolus.
sentences.chinese: 這座精緻的陵墓是爲國王摩挲拉斯而建的。

sentences.english: The high point of the pilgrimage circuit is Kim Il Sung's mausoleum.
sentences.chinese: 金日成陵墓是至高無上的這麼一個地方。

sentences.english: The Stone Arch marks the beginning of the Sacred Way to the Tombs.
sentences.chinese: 那個石拱門標誌着通往陵墓的神道的開始。

sentences.english: New Grange is one of the most extravagantly decorated prehistoric tombs.
sentences.chinese: 新格蘭奇是裝飾最豪華的史前陵墓之一。

sentences.english: Dingling- the only one of the Ming Tombs excavated so far.
sentences.chinese: 定陵，到目前爲止唯一出土的明朝陵墓。

sentences.english: Chinese architecture ranges from temples, gardens, mausoleums , pagodas and imperial palaces to residential houses.
sentences.chinese: 中國建築涉及寺廟，園林，陵墓，塔，宮殿，住宅等。

sentences.english: The foundations of the mausoleum are buried deep in the earth's crust.
sentences.chinese: 陵墓的地基深埋在地殼中。

sentences.english: I think you must be right in the days of this tomb is very familiar with construction projects.
sentences.chinese: 我想您一定是對這座陵墓裏的天目構造十分熟悉了。

sentences.english: First, recent claims of the mausoleum's minarets tilting are untrue.
sentences.chinese: 首先，最近有關陵墓塔尖傾斜的說法是不實的。

definition: underground palace (as part of imperial tomb)
funerary objects (items buried together with the dead)
the tomb of the first emperor at Mt Li 驪山|骊山[Li2 shan1] near Xi'an (awaits excavation)
path leading to a grave/tomb passage/aisle leading to the coffin chamber of an ancient tomb
